attributes.action: BBC to give one year of no licence fee
attributes.additional_details:
With all the recent BBC stories about  squandering and theft of our money.

I believe they should give us our licence free for one year.

They are constantly in the news for negligence.  The amount of money they have wasted is criminal.

 I feel it's time some was given back.

Please sign this petition if you agree with me.
